author: James Van Straten, AI Boost
title: Anthony Pompliano Set to Head $750M Bitcoin Investment Vehicle: FT
description: The crypto advocate is preparing to lead ProCapBTC in bid to mirror the bitcoin treasury strategy pioneered by Strategy's Michael Saylor, the Financial Times reported.
content:
Anthony Pompliano, a digital assets influencer and podcast host, is set to become CEO of ProCapBTC, a new investment vehicle aiming to acquire large amounts of bitcoin 
, according to the Financial … [+1528 chars]
